text: Steven M. AwodeySteven M. Awodey, Logic in Topoi – PhilPapers (; born 1959) is an American mathematician and philosopher of mathematics. He is a Professor of Philosophy and Mathematics at Carnegie Mellon University. ==Biography== Awodey studied mathematics and philosophy at the University of Marburg and the University of Chicago. He earned his Ph.D. from Chicago under Saunders Mac Lane in 1997. He is an active researcher in the areas of category theory and logic, and has also written on the philosophy of mathematics.
